word:
Life and death question. 


     "We can not consent at this period of time to expose our youth to the consequences of learning a mixture of truth with error. The youth 
                                                                           6
who come from school without feeling the importance of making the Word of God the first study, the main study, above every science in educational lines, are not qualified in these days of peril to enter upon the work of the teacher. The question of how to obtain the knowledge of God is to all a life-and-death question."--Idem.
